text: Can you please modify my appointment scheduled for March 25th with Dr. Kim to March 26th with Dr. Lee?
Sure, I can help you with that. Please provide me with the appointment ID and the new appointment date and doctor's name.
The appointment ID is 34567890 and the new date is March 26th with Dr. Lee.
Alright. I'll modify your appointment now.
Your appointment has been modified successfully.
Can you also check my health data for the past week?
Of course. To do that, I'll need your user ID and the start and end time of the time span you want to check.
My user ID is J46801 and I want to check from March 5th to March 12th.
Here are your health data for that period: [{"time": "2023-03-11 14:20:00", "blood_pressure": [140, 90], "triglycerides": 130, "heart_rate": 85}].
Actually, can you cancel the appointment instead of modifying it?
Sure thing. Please provide me the appointment ID, patient name, date, and doctor name.
The appointment ID is 90123456, the patient name is Olivia Davis, the date is October 10th, and the doctor name is Dr. Smith.
All right, canceling that appointment for you.
